title: Sasheer Doesn’t Like When Animals Speak
description:
This week, Nicole and Sasheer reminisce over childhood movies with animals and whether the animals talked in them or not. Then they take a BuzzFeed quiz where picking your favorite cakes determines what Disney villain you are and Nicole is shook by the results! Afterwards, they answer fan questions which include whether to stay friends with an ex and dealing with a friend’s mean sister in Mexico. Enjoy this episode, and remember if it’s after 8pm, you only have to talk to food. 

 

Take BuzzFeed Quiz “Only Cake Can Determine Which Disney Villain You Truly Embody”: https://www.buzzfeed.com/naeun12/disney-villain-cake-buffet-quiz

 

Email or call Nicole & Sasheer with your friendship questions at:

nicoleandsasheer@gmail.com

424-645-7003
author: fanmail+bestfriends@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
